body: I am writing to express my strong interest in the Full Stack Web Developer position. As a passionate developer with expertise in building scalable web applications using modern technologies, I am excited to contribute to your team's success.

At Avidus Interactive, I developed 8+ scalable web applications using ReactJS, NextJS, Node.js, and MongoDB, improving performance by 40%. I implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 50% while maintaining 99% uptime.

Beyond technical skills, I excel in cross-functional Agile collaboration using Jira and Confluence. I have resolved 100+ production issues and mentored junior developers. My portfolio includes Resolution Pro, supporting 500+ concurrent users, and Caffetest, an automated testing framework saving 15+ developer hours weekly.

I am drawn to your organization's commitment to innovation and technology excellence. My technical expertise, problem-solving abilities, and passion for user-centric applications align perfectly with your team's goals, and I am eager to contribute meaningfully to your projects.

Thank you for considering my application. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my background, skills, and enthusiasm can contribute to your team's continued success. I look forward to the possibility of speaking with you soon.
